title: Looking for Duo
body:
Hi guys, 
Im Silver 1, Mid and Support main. 
Looking for a duo that preferably plays ADC or JG. Adc for the duo bot, and/or jungle as I am horrendously bad at jungle :'|  
Mainly wanting a duo so i have someone reliable, that wont afk/flame, and doesn't take losing too bad. Also to have fun! :D and to help each other improve and hopefully get to gold :D
It doesn't really matter what role you play, as long as you are friendly, and don't mind taking/giving criticism. 

Also we can curse :D
Reply here or add me in game if you are interested. 

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=PROJECT%20Ahri  <= My op.gg :D {{champion:103}}

replies.body: I am only silver 4 but i'm ok with adc and pref the role of jg. I'm also semi serious so i will takke losing bad if it is a demotion, give me a reply if that's ok
